<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Terminators mark the end of a basic block which means the sequentially</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// next instruction will be the first of another basic block and the current</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
